# NSLayoutConstraint.Orientation.vertical

**Case**

The constraint orientation applied to laying out the vertical relationship between objects.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Constants

- **NSLayoutConstraint.Orientation.horizontal**: The constraint orientation applied to laying out the horizontal relationship between objects.
